amendment.description: Amendment provides a Jones Act waiver for the tug NORFOLK before January 1, 2001, only if before that date the vessel undergoes a major conversion in a shipyard located in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to allow a certificate of documentation for the vessel NORFOLK before January 1, 2001, if before that date the vessel undergoes a major conversion in a shipyard located in the United States and the cost of the conversion is more that three times the amount the owner paid to purchase the vessel.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pickett amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
